sourceMeaningMnemonic: You <radical>say</radical> to some <radical>grain</radical> and some <radical>stairs</radical>: I want to <kanji>invite</kanji> you to my place.
meaningInfo: So you do. You invite a stalk of grain and a set of stairs to your home.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>invite</kanji>d them to your home because your roommate was having a party and inviting a lot of <reading>you</reading>ths (<ja>ゆう</ja>) over. You wanted to look cool, so you invited some grain and some stairs, the two coolest things you could think of.
readingInfo: Surprisingly, the youths were impressed and spent a long time trying to talk to them.
